theRuin:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theRuin:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theRuin:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theRuin:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theRuin:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theRuin:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theRuin:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theRuin:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theRuin:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theRuin:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theRuin:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theRuin:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theRuin:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
